name: Tank Them All
description:
Tank Them All is a prototype developed under Unreal engine 4. It's the project for the end of my training year in game programming at the GameDev Academy.

It’s a local multiplayer where you play a tank. The goal is to kill all other players. The game can be played from two to four players. It’s played with a gamepad, the player uses the left joystick for moving his tank and the right one for rotating the turret.

Any constructive feedback is welcome for improve the game, let me know if you like it.
